channel.title: Openssl on 逃避虽然可耻但有用
channel.description: Recent content in Openssl on 逃避虽然可耻但有用

item.title: VS2013静态编译openssl批处理
item.description: 打开 Visual Studio 2013 Command Prompt wget http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.11.08/win32/nasm-2.11.08-win32.zip unzip nasm-2.11.08-win32.zip -d C:/nasm set PATH=%PATH%;C:/nasm/ wget https://www.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.0.2d.tar.gz tar xzf openssl-1.0.2d.tar.gz cd openssl-1.0.2d perl configure VC-WIN32 --prefix=C:/openssl ms\do_nasm nmake -f ms\nt.mak nmake -f ms\nt.mak install echo "build successed." 这样编译不会产生 error A2070:invalid instruction operands 这个错误
